knimeNode.name: Fixture Statistics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query detailed match statistics for a fixture

intro.p: Queries detailed match statistics for a specific fixture from the Football API. Returns statistics for both teams including shots, possession, passes, fouls, corners, offsides, and more.

fullDescription.option: The numeric ID of the fixture to query statistics for.

ports.outPort: Statistics with columns: Team_ID, Team_Name, Statistic_Type, Value
